description: Your passport to adventure, reimagined for Windows 8. Travel is the premier travel app designed to turn your device into a window to the world. Whether you are dreaming of your next getaway or ready to book a flight, the app provides a breathtaking, panoramic experience that combines inspiration with high-utility travel tools. From 360-degree panoramas to expert reviews, everything you need for the perfect trip is just a swipe away.
